trans-unit.source: Provides data for an event that is raised by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control after a data operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para um evento que é gerado pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> controla após uma operação de dados foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> events to pass information about a database operation after it is performed by the data source control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs é utilizada no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>eventos para passar informações sobre uma operação de base de dados após-é efetuada pelos dados de controlo de origem.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>

trans-unit.source: This information includes the number of rows affected by the operation, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object that the data source used to perform the operation, and any exception information that resulted.
trans-unit.target: Estas informações incluem o número de linhas afetados pela operação, o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>objeto que a origem de dados utilizada para efetuar a operação e quaisquer informações de exceção que resultaram.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> events, you can examine this data and perform any additional post processing required.
trans-unit.target: Ao adicionar um delegado de processador de eventos para processar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>eventos, pode examinar estes dados e efetuar qualquer processamento adicional post necessário.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying data objects during the course of a data operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>controlo expõe muitos eventos que pode processar para trabalhar com objetos de dados subjacente no decorrer de uma operação de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> and event handler classes, to better guide you to the various events that correspond to the life cycle of a data operation using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte lista os eventos e associados <xref:System.EventArgs>e classes de processador de eventos, para melhor ajudá-lo para os vários eventos que correspondem o ciclo de vida de uma operação de dados com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting> occurs before the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting> occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> occur after the data retrieval, insert, update, or delete operations completes.|SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: | Evento | EventArgs | EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>ocorre antes dos dados são obtidos. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>ocorrer antes de uma insert, update ou de operação de eliminação é efetuada. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>ocorrer após a obtenção de dados, inserir, atualizar ou eliminar operações de conclusão. | SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs"></xref> class, using the specified output parameters, return value, and number of rows affected by the database operation.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs"> </xref> classe, utilizando os parâmetros de saída especificado, o valor de retorno e o número das linhas afetadas pela operação de base de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> that represents the database query, command, or stored procedure that is submitted to the database by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> que representa a consulta de base de dados, o comando ou o procedimento armazenado que é submetido para a base de dados pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the database operation, if applicable.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas afetados pela operação de base de dados, se aplicável.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> thrown by the database operation, if applicable.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Exception>emitida pela operação de base de dados, se aplicável.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows affected by a database operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de linhas afetadas por uma operação de base de dados.

trans-unit.source: All operations return the number of rows affected by the operation.
trans-unit.target: Todas as operações de devolvem o número de linhas afetados pela operação.

trans-unit.source: The AffectedRows property has the same value as the return value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de AffectedRows tem o mesmo valor que o valor de retorno do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method is called and the data source is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> mode, the return value is 0 in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>método for chamado e a origem de dados está definida como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode>modo, o valor de retorno é 0 em todos os casos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by a database operation.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas afetadas por uma operação de base de dados.

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é de -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the database command submitted to the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comando de base de dados submetido para a base de dados.

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> event to examine and manipulate the properties of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> after it is submitted by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control to the database.
trans-unit.target: Pode processar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>eventos para examinar e manipular as propriedades do <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>depois-é submetido pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>controlo na base de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>

trans-unit.source: The Command property enables you to access return values and values in any output parameters after the database operation is performed through its <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> property, as well as the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A> property, which represents the SQL query, command, or stored procedure name that was submitted to the database.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade do comando permite-lhe aceder a valores de retorno e os valores de quaisquer parâmetros de saída depois da operação de base de dados é realizada através do respetivo <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A>propriedade, bem como o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>propriedade, o que representa a consulta SQL, o comando ou o nome de procedimento armazenado que foi submetido para a base de dados.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any output parameters are specifically from parameters that have an <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> or <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object.
trans-unit.target: Quaisquer parâmetros de saída são especificamente de parâmetros que tenham um <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>ou <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>

trans-unit.source: A return value is from a parameter that has a <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor devolvido é de um parâmetro que tenha um <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>valor.</xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object that represents the database command submitted to the database.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> objeto que representa o comando de base de dados submetidos para a base de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a wrapper for any exceptions thrown by the database during a data operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um wrapper para quaisquer exceções iniciadas pela base de dados durante uma operação de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> property does not represent the actual exception thrown by the database operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Exception>propriedade não representa a exceção real emitida pela operação de base de dados.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: You can access the thrown exception using the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder através de exceções iniciadas o <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that wraps any exceptions thrown by the database in its <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Exception>que encapsula num wrapper eventuais exceções geradas pela base de dados na respetiva <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>propriedade.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception thrown by the database has been handled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se uma exceção emitida pela base de dados foi processada.

trans-unit.source: If the database throws an exception, the ExceptionHandled property is set to `false` and the exception is wrapped by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se a base de dados emite uma exceção, a propriedade ExceptionHandled estiver definida como `false` e a exceção é eliminada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>, you can check the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> property and handle the exception.
trans-unit.target: Se utilizar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>, pode verificar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>propriedade e o identificador a exceção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the exception, set the ExceptionHandled property to `true` or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se a lidar com a exceção, defina a propriedade de ExceptionHandled como `true` ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>controlo irá gerar uma exceção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an exception thrown by the database has been handled and should not be thrown by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se uma exceção emitida pela base de dados tem sido processada e não devem ser emitida pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> controlar; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
